verses.verse: And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

<S%H7971>Send<s%> thou <S%H582>men<s%>, that they may <S%H8446>search<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%>, which I <S%H5414>give<s%> unto the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: of <S%H376>every<s%> <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers<s%> shall ye <S%H7971>send<s%> a <S%H259>man<s%>, every one a <S%H5387>ruler<s%> among them.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> by the <S%H6310>commandment<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> them from the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H6290>Paran<s%>: all those <S%H582>men<s%> <S%H1992>were<s%> <S%H7218>heads<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.
And these were their <S%H8034>names<s%>: of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%>, <S%H8051>Shammua<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2139>Zaccur<s%>.
Of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H8095>Simeon<s%>, <S%H8202>Shaphat<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2753>Hori<s%>.
Of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, <S%H3612>Caleb<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3312>Jephunneh<s%>.
Of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H3485>Issachar<s%>, <S%H3008>Igal<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph<s%>.
Of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%>, <S%H1954>Oshea<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5126>Nun<s%>.
Of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%>, <S%H6406>Palti<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7505>Raphu<s%>.
Of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H2074>Zebulun<s%>, <S%H1427>Gaddiel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5476>Sodi<s%>.
Of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph<s%>, namely, of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%>, <S%H1426>Gaddi<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5485>Susi<s%>.
Of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H1835>Dan<s%>, <S%H5988>Ammiel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1582>Gemalli<s%>.
Of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H836>Asher<s%>, <S%H5639>Sethur<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4317>Michael<s%>.
Of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H5321>Naphtali<s%>, <S%H5147>Nahbi<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2058>Vophsi<s%>.
Of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad<s%>, <S%H1345>Geuel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4352>Machi<s%>.

These are the <S%H8034>names<s%> of the <S%H582>men<s%> which <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> to spy <S%H8446>out<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%>. And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H1954>Oshea<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5126>Nun<s%> <S%H3091>Jehoshua<s%>.

¶ And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> them to spy <S%H8446>out<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto them, Get you <S%H5927>up<s%> this way <S%H5045>southward<s%>, and go <S%H5927>up<s%> into the <S%H2022>mountain<s%>:

And <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%>, what it is; and the <S%H5971>people<s%> that <S%H3427>dwelleth<s%> therein, whether they be <S%H2389>strong<s%> or <S%H7504>weak<s%>, <S%H4592>few<s%> or <S%H7227>many<s%>;

And what the <S%H776>land<s%> is that they dwell <S%H3427>in<s%>, whether it be <S%H2896>good<s%> or <S%H7451>bad<s%>; and what <S%H5892>cities<s%> they be that they <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H2007>in<s%>, whether in <S%H4264>tents<s%>, or in strong <S%H4013>holds<s%>;

And what the <S%H776>land<s%> is, whether it be <S%H8082>fat<s%> or <S%H7330>lean<s%>, whether there <S%H3426>be<s%> <S%H6086>wood<s%> therein, or not. And be ye of good <S%H2388>courage<s%>, and <S%H3947>bring<s%> of the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%>. Now the <S%H3117>time<s%> was the <S%H3117>time<s%> of the <S%H1061>firstripe<s%> <S%H6025>grapes<s%>.

¶ So they went <S%H5927>up<s%>, and <S%H8446>searched<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> from the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H6790>Zin<s%> unto <S%H7340>Rehob<s%>, as men <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H2574>Hamath<s%>.

And they <S%H5927>ascended<s%> by the <S%H5045>south<s%>, and <S%H935>came<s%> unto <S%H2275>Hebron<s%>; where <S%H289>Ahiman<s%>, <S%H8344>Sheshai<s%>, and <S%H8526>Talmai<s%>, the <S%H3211>children<s%> of <S%H6061>Anak<s%>, were. (Now <S%H2275>Hebron<s%> was <S%H1129>built<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H6814>Zoan<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>.)

And they <S%H935>came<s%> unto the <S%H5158>brook<s%> of <S%H812>Eshcol<s%>, and cut <S%H3772>down<s%> from thence a <S%H2156>branch<s%> with <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H811>cluster<s%> of <S%H6025>grapes<s%>, and they <S%H5375>bare<s%> it between <S%H8147>two<s%> upon a <S%H4132>staff<s%>; and they brought of the <S%H7416>pomegranates<s%>, and of the <S%H8384>figs<s%>.

The <S%H4725>place<s%> was <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H5158>brook<s%> <S%H812>Eshcol<s%>, because <S%H182>of<s%> the cluster of <S%H811>grapes<s%> which the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> cut <S%H3772>down<s%> from thence.
And they <S%H7725>returned<s%> from <S%H8446>searching<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H7093>after<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>.

¶ And they <S%H3212>went<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, and to <S%H175>Aaron<s%>, and to all the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, unto the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H6290>Paran<s%>, to <S%H6946>Kadesh<s%>; and brought <S%H7725>back<s%> <S%H1697>word<s%> unto them, and unto all the <S%H5712>congregation<s%>, and <S%H7200>shewed<s%> them the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%>.

And they <S%H5608>told<s%> him, and <S%H559>said<s%>, We <S%H935>came<s%> unto the <S%H776>land<s%> whither thou <S%H7971>sentest<s%> us, and surely it <S%H2100>floweth<s%> with <S%H2461>milk<s%> and <S%H1706>honey<s%>; and this is the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of it.

<S%H657>Nevertheless<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> be <S%H5794>strong<s%> that <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%>, and the <S%H5892>cities<s%> are <S%H1219>walled<s%>, and <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%>: and moreover we <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H3211>children<s%> of <S%H6061>Anak<s%> there.

The <S%H6002>Amalekites<s%> <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H5045>south<s%>: and the <S%H2850>Hittites<s%>, and the <S%H2983>Jebusites<s%>, and the <S%H567>Amorites<s%>, <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in the <S%H2022>mountains<s%>: and the <S%H3669>Canaanites<s%> <S%H3427>dwell<s%> by the <S%H3220>sea<s%>, and by the <S%H3027>coast<s%> of <S%H3383>Jordan<s%>.

And <S%H3612>Caleb<s%> <S%H2013>stilled<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> before <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, Let us go <S%H5927>up<s%> at <S%H5927>once<s%>, and <S%H3423>possess<s%> it; for we are well <S%H3201>able<s%> to <S%H3201>overcome<s%> it.

But the <S%H582>men<s%> that went <S%H5927>up<s%> with him <S%H559>said<s%>, We be not <S%H3201>able<s%> to go <S%H5927>up<s%> against the <S%H5971>people<s%>; for they are <S%H2389>stronger<s%> than we.

And they brought <S%H3318>up<s%> an evil <S%H1681>report<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> which they had <S%H8446>searched<s%> unto the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, The <S%H776>land<s%>, through which we have <S%H5674>gone<s%> to <S%H8446>search<s%> it, is a <S%H776>land<s%> that eateth <S%H398>up<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> thereof; and all the <S%H5971>people<s%> that we <S%H7200>saw<s%> in <S%H8432>it<s%> are <S%H582>men<s%> of a great <S%H4060>stature<s%>.

And there we <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H5303>giants<s%>, the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6061>Anak<s%>, which come of the <S%H5303>giants<s%>: and we were in our own <S%H5869>sight<s%> as <S%H2284>grasshoppers<s%>, and so we were in their <S%H5869>sight<s%>.
